articles.title: ‘No BlackRock, no party' for Bitcoin, altcoin ETF investments: K33 Research
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: BlackRock was the only reason Bitcoin ETF investments didn't turn negative in 2025. There are concerns for altcoin ETF performance without the asset manager BlackRock's help. BlackRock is the only asset manager that managed Bitcoin investments in the Bitcoin Exchange Traded Fund.

articles.title: Metaplanet Secures $500M Bitcoin Credit Line and Launches 13% Share Buyback Program
articles.author: Crypto Economy
articles.summary: Metaplanet secures a $500M Bitcoin-backed credit facility and announces a 13% share buyback funded by the credit line. It's the leading corporate Bitcoin holder in Asia and is often referred to as the '' or the 'Metamplanet'.

articles.title: WazirX Relaunches Trading with Zero Fee Incentive
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: Cryptocurrency exchange WazirX will resume trading from 24 October offering zero-trading-fees for a 30-day window as it restarts operations in phases through 27 October. The move follows regulatory and judicial approval of its restructuring scheme and signals a push to restore liquidity and confirm technical stability.

articles.title: Crypto Pauses After Hitting 2-Week Highs; All Eyes on Fed Decision This Week
articles.author: Coin Edition
articles.summary: Crypto markets pulled back slightly Tuesday after hitting 2-week highs Monday (BTC $116K). Monday's rally was fueled by strong Fed rate cut expectations ahead of Oct 28-29 FOMC. Market now pauses (BTC ~$114K) awaiting Fed decision/Powell comments Wednesday.

articles.title: Trump Organization Income Soars 17-Fold on Global Crypto Token Sales Push
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: The Trump Organization's income jumped to $864 million in the first half of 2025, a 17-fold increase from $51 million the previous year. Cryptocurrency ventures accounted for $802 million, with the remainder from golf clubs, resorts and real estate licensing deals.
